check.checkname: 新增用户信息时检查登录名称
check.checksql: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM jy_user t WHERE t.loginname=$S{loginname}

sqlinfo.sql: UPDATE jy_user t SET t.role=$N{role}, t.organize_code=$S{organize_code}, t.code=$S{code}, t.name=$S{name}, t.ophone=$S{ophone}, t.mphone=$S{mphone} WHERE t.id=$N{id}
UPDATE jy_user SET passwd=$S{passwd} WHERE id=$N{id}
UPDATE jy_user t SET t.status=$S{status} WHERE t.id=$N{id}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 删除用户仓库信息信息
新增用户仓库信息信息

sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t.id,t.loginname,t.passwd,t.role,t.organize_code,t.code,t.name,t.ophone,t.mphone,t.status FROM jy_user t WHERE ($isnull{id} or t.id=$n{id}) AND ($isnull{loginname} OR t.loginname LIKE '%$U{loginname}%') AND ($isnull{role} OR t.id=$S{role}) AND ($isnull{organize_code} OR t.organize_code=$S{organize_code}) AND ($isnull{code} OR t.code LIKE '%$U{code}%') AND ($isnull{name} OR t.name LIKE '%$U{name}%') AND ($isnull{status} OR t.status =$S{status}) ORDER BY t.id DESC
SELECT t.id id, CONCAT(t.code,'-',t.name) orgname FROM jy_user t ORDER BY t.id
SELECT id FROM jy_user WHERE loginname=$S{loginname}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询用户登录账号及密码
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT id,passwd FROM jy_user WHERE loginname=$S{loginname}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询用户有的仓库编码
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT storehouse_code FROM jy_user_storehouse WHERE jy_user_id=$S{sys_user_id}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询其他仓库员有的仓库编码（不包括自己）
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT storehouse_code FROM jy_user_storehouse WHERE jy_user_id!=$S{sys_user_id}
